Package utilities

Class BatchJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.BatchJob

  • public class BatchJob
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a batch job within the simulation framework.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean alreadyRescheduled
      Indicates whether a job is already rescheduled (used by the EventHandler, when it handles a pause event for this job).
      private int amountOfServers
      Amount of servers that this job occupies during execution.
      private double averagePowerConsumption
      Average power consumption that was parsed from the workload trace.
      private int delay
      Amount of simulation timesteps that the job finished after its specified SLA deadline.
      private int duration
      Duration in simulation time that was parsed from the workload trace.
      private int elapsedRuntime
      Amount of simulation timesteps for which the job was already executed.
      private Event finishEvent
      Finish event of the job.
      private int finishingTime
      Actual finishing time of the job.
      private double frequency
      Current execution frequency of the job.
      private java.lang.String id
      Unique ID of the job.
      private int jobClass
      Job class that was parsed from the workload trace.
      private double originalFrequency
      Originally parsed execution frequency of the job.
      private int pausedTime
      Amount of simulation timesteps that job was in the PAUSED status.
      private int remainingRuntime
      Amount of simulation timesteps that still have to be executed until the job finishes.
      private boolean requestedToPause
      Indicates whether the job is currently requested to pause and thus a pause event is scheduled for it.
      private Event restartEvent
      Restart event of the job.
      private int scheduledRestartTime
      Currently scheduled restart time of the job.
      private int scheduledStartTime
      Currently scheduled start time of the job.
      private java.util.List<Server> servers
      List of all servers on which the job is executed.
      private int slaDeadline
      SLA deadline in simulation time.
      private SLAModel slaModel
      SLA model that is utilized by the job.
      private Event startEvent
      Start event of the job.
      private BatchJobStatus status
      Current status of the job.
      private int submissionTime
      Submission time of the job.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private java.lang.String id
        Unique ID of the job.

      • frequency

        private double frequency
        Current execution frequency of the job.

      • originalFrequency

        private double originalFrequency
        Originally parsed execution frequency of the job.

      • amountOfServers

        private int amountOfServers
        Amount of servers that this job occupies during execution.

      • averagePowerConsumption

        private double averagePowerConsumption
        Average power consumption that was parsed from the workload trace.

      • duration

        private int duration
        Duration in simulation time that was parsed from the workload trace.

      • jobClass

        private int jobClass
        Job class that was parsed from the workload trace.

      • slaDeadline

        private int slaDeadline
        SLA deadline in simulation time.

      • slaModel

        private SLAModel slaModel
        SLA model that is utilized by the job.

      • delay

        private int delay
        Amount of simulation timesteps that the job finished after its specified SLA deadline. This is 0 until the job has actually finished.

      • submissionTime

        private int submissionTime
        Submission time of the job.

      • scheduledStartTime

        private int scheduledStartTime
        Currently scheduled start time of the job.

      • scheduledRestartTime

        private int scheduledRestartTime
        Currently scheduled restart time of the job.

      • finishingTime

        private int finishingTime
        Actual finishing time of the job.

      • elapsedRuntime

        private int elapsedRuntime
        Amount of simulation timesteps for which the job was already executed.

      • remainingRuntime

        private int remainingRuntime
        Amount of simulation timesteps that still have to be executed until the job finishes.

      • pausedTime

        private int pausedTime
        Amount of simulation timesteps that job was in the PAUSED status.

      • finishEvent

        private Event finishEvent
        Finish event of the job.

      • startEvent

        private Event startEvent
        Start event of the job.

      • restartEvent

        private Event restartEvent
        Restart event of the job.

      • status

        private BatchJobStatus status
        Current status of the job.

      • requestedToPause

        private boolean requestedToPause
        Indicates whether the job is currently requested to pause and thus a pause event is scheduled for it.

      • alreadyRescheduled

        private boolean alreadyRescheduled
        Indicates whether a job is already rescheduled (used by the EventHandler, when it handles a pause event for this job).

      • servers

        private java.util.List<Server> servers
        List of all servers on which the job is executed. This is null if the job is currently not running.

    • Method Detail

      • deepCopy

        public BatchJob deepCopy​()
        Provides a deep copy of the job.
        Returns:
        Deep copy instance of the instance on which this method is called.

      • calculateSLACosts

        public double calculateSLACosts​(double usagePrice)
        Calculates the SLA costs of a job. This method uses the delay variable of the job and thus the SLA costs that are calculated by this method are 0 until the job has actually finished. Before this, the getCurrentlyCausedSLACosts method can be used.
        Parameters:
        usagePrice - Usage price that the DC, in which this job is executed, charges per compute node per hour in euro.
        Returns:
        SLA costs of the job.

      • getCurrentlyCausedSLACosts

        public double getCurrentlyCausedSLACosts​(double usagePrice)
        Calculates the currently estimated SLA costs of this job. The estimation is based on the assumption the the job runs until the end in the current configuration and without being shifted.
        Parameters:
        usagePrice - Usage price that the DC, in which this job is executed, charges per compute node per hour in euro.
        Returns:
        Estimated SLA costs of the job.

      • elapseOneSimulationTimestep

        public void elapseOneSimulationTimestep​()
        Elapse one simulation timestep for the job. If the job is running, the elapsedRuntime and the remainingRuntime are adjusted. Otherwise, if the job is paused or rescheduled, the paused time is updated.

      • getCalculatedFinishTime

        public int getCalculatedFinishTime​()
        Returns the estimated finish time of this job. Thereby, it is assumed that the run configuration of the job is not changed and that the job is not shifted.
        Returns:
        Estimated finish time in simulation time.

      • getParsedAveragePowerConsumption

        public double getParsedAveragePowerConsumption​()
        Returns the APC value of the job that was parsed from the workload trace.
        Returns:
        Parsed APC value of the job.

      • getModeledAveragePowerConsumption

        public double getModeledAveragePowerConsumption​()
        Returns the APC value of the job that is obtained by the currently used server power consumption model.
        Returns:
        Modeled APC value of the job.

      • getTotalPowerConsumption

        public double getTotalPowerConsumption​()
        Returns the total APC value of the job. This means that the modeled APC value is multiplied with the amount of nodes that this job utilizes before it is returned.
        Returns:
        Total APC value of this job.

      • setFrequency

        public void setFrequency​(double frequency)
        Sets the execution frequency of the job and automatically updates the APC value and the remaining runtime of the job.
        Parameters:
        frequency - New execution frequency of the job.
